string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: Take Control of Your Location:The most drastic way to improve your phones battery life is to shut off the GPS function entirely
Switch to the Dark Side:If your phone sports an OLED screen, switching to a dark theme helps to preserve the battery

Turn Off Automatic Wi-Fi:Android comes with a feature that continues to look for open Wi-Fi networks even when you have disabled Wi-Fi. To turn it off, open Settings > Network and internet > Wi-Fi. Under Wi-Fi preferences, uncheck the Turn on Wi-Fi automatically option

Limit Apps Running in the Background:Most apps you use are active even after you exit them. That is where this battery saver app comes in handy .Click on background apps above and close background applications
Rethink Wallpaper and Widgets:Stay away from moving wallpaper, because it takes energy for your display to animate it
Avoid draining your phone battery all the way to 0% or charging it all the way to 100%
